attributes.action: Allow Use of Mobile Phones in Secondary School
attributes.additional_details: There have been countless times were students would of benefited from having access to their phone. For example - people needing to contact parents for items they have forgotten and they need for lessons or needing to do quick revision for a refresher before a test.
attributes.background: Students should be allowed to go on their phones during break and lunch times for entertainment, communicating with family and  for revision/homework purposes. You could also regulate it to certain years for example once you get into year 8 and above mobile phone use is allowed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: 
'Require schools to allow children to bring a mobile phone into secondary school'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641178
